name: Cedaria: Blackout
blurb: Cedaria: Blackout takes a Middle Eastern spin on well-known RPG elements in a Steampunk setting influenced by real world events.

rewards.reward: No Reward
MOBILE GAMER\r\n==============================\r\nDigital downloadable copy of the smartphone version + A couple of digital desktop wallpapers + A ringtone for your smartphone

GAMER
==============================
All rewards from MOBILE GAMER +
Digital singleplayer version of Cedaria: Blackout

CONNECTED
==============================
All rewards from GAMER +
Digital multiplayer version of Cedaria: Blackout + Forum badge tier 1
SOUNDTRACK\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from CONNECTED + Digital CD Soundtrack + Digital HQ world map
TRAVELER\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from SOUNDTRACK + Forum badge tier 2 + Digital novella pack + Design documents + Access to Beta version and Beta forum  + Extra game key
SPECIALIST\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from SOUNDTRACK + Name a smartphone specialist (within reason)
TEAM PLAYER\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from SPECIALIST + Forum badge tier 3 + 2 Extra game keys (total 4)

SETTLER\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from SPECIALIST + Forum badge tier 4 + Design a smartphone specialist, pick his/her profession and general likeness + Place in credits under 3rd wave
RUMOR\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from SETTLER + instead of a specialist help us design a rumor
INTEGRATED\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from SETTLER + instead of a specialist move in permanently and get your name on a door in Castellum + Forum badge tier 5
SUPPORTING CAST\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from SETTLER + instead of a specialist give your name to a minor NPC (within reason) + Place in credits under 2nd wave

LEADING ROLE\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from SETTLER + instead of a specialist give your name to a major NPC (within reason) + Forum badge tier 6 + Place in credits under 2nd wave

CLASSROOM EDITION\r\n==============================\r\nDigital downloadable copy of the smartphone version + A couple of digital desktop wallpapers + A ringtone for your smartphone + Digital multiplayer version of Cedaria: Blackout + Digital CD Soundtrack + 30 Extra game keys (total 31)

SCHOLAR\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from SETTLER + give your name to a major NPC (within reason) + move in permanently and get your name on a door in Castellum + give your name to a minor NPC (within reason) + give your name to a major NPC (within reason) + Forum badge tier 7 + 7 Extra game keys (total 11)

PROFESSOR\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from SCHOLAR + name a location in the game (within reason) + Forum badge tier 8 + Place in credits under 1st wave + 5 Extra game keys (total 16)

SCHOOL EDITION\r\n==============================\r\nDigital downloadable copy of the smartphone version + A couple of digital desktop wallpapers + A ringtone for your smartphone + Digital multiplayer version of Cedaria: Blackout + Digital CD Soundtrack + 300 Extra game keys (total 301)

LIVING LEGEND\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from PROFESSOR + design a custom legend (within reason) + Forum badge tier 9 + 15 Extra game keys (total 31) + Place in credits under legendary explorer

CAPTAIN OF INDUSTRY\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from LIVING LEGEND + we will create a statue based on a picture from you (within reason) + The statue will be featured in a prominent position in the game + Forum badge tier 10

FOUNDER\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from LIVING LEGEND + we will create a painting based on a picture from you (within reason) + The painting will be featured in a prominent position in the game + Forum badge tier 11

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from PROFESSOR + design a custom legend (within reason) + Forum badge Developer + 50 copies of the game + We will discuss your level of involvement based on your free time, skills and interests + Place first in credits as Executive Producer
